docs.snippet: As indicated by the returns received on Tuesday night, the State and Congressional elections in Pennsylvania have resulted in an overwhelming defeat of the Administration, and the consequent repudiation of Lecomptonism.
docs.lead_paragraph: As indicated by the returns received on Tuesday night, the State and Congressional elections in Pennsylvania have resulted in an overwhelming defeat of the Administration, and the consequent repudiation of Lecomptonism.

docs.snippet: FATAL ACCIDENT ON BOARD THE STEAMER CITY OF BILTIMORE.-A serious accident occurred on board the steamer City of Baltimore yesterday, upon the arrival of that vessel, which caused the instant death of one of the crew and the maiming of another. It is...
docs.lead_paragraph: FATAL ACCIDENT ON BOARD THE STEAMER CITY OF BILTIMORE.-A serious accident occurred on board the steamer City of Baltimore yesterday, upon the arrival of that vessel, which caused the instant death of one of the crew and the maiming of another. It is always customary for these steamers to fire one or two guns as theo pass through the Narrows, partly to attract the attention of the Health Officer, and also as a salute.

docs.snippet: From the London Daily Notes. It is a serious matter at any time to deal with a disturbed, much more with an insurgent New-York. There is nowhere a more heterogeneous Population, and the great heterogeneous populations of the world's chief ports are...
docs.lead_paragraph: From the London Daily Notes. It is a serious matter at any time to deal with a disturbed, much more with an insurgent New-York. There is nowhere a more heterogeneous Population, and the great heterogeneous populations of the world's chief ports are elsewhere kept in order by the ancient customs of long-established power.

docs.snippet: The Cumberland and the Commodore, with the corvettes Dale and vincennes, and the Storeship Release, of Arctic fame. have all been filing up with provisions at Porto Praya, for immediate cruising down the coast. The Date goes, in a few days, to the...

headline.main: West of Africa.; Corresponding of the New-Orleans Picayune.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cumberland and the Commodore, with the corvettes Dale and vincennes, and the Storeship Release, of Arctic fame. have all been filing up with provisions at Porto Praya, for immediate cruising down the coast. The Date goes, in a few days, to the Gulf of Guinea, the mouths of the Niger, Fernando Po, and to the country of Dahomey, with its Amazonian army.

docs.snippet: Another year of abundant harvests, of general health, contentment and tranquillity, admonish us of our first and constant duty, to render thanks and praise to Him who is the gracious Author and Giver of those: needful benefits, and the manifold...
docs.lead_paragraph: Another year of abundant harvests, of general health, contentment and tranquillity, admonish us of our first and constant duty, to render thanks and praise to Him who is the gracious Author and Giver of those: needful benefits, and the manifold blessings we have been permitted to enjoy; and especially are we called upon to acknowledge the power and goodness of our almighty Father.

headline.main: EUROPE.; THE NEWS BY THE INDIAN EMPIRE. Cotton Quiet--Breadstuffs Very Dull and Lower-Consols 98 1-8. Defeat of the Gwalior Rebels---Capture of a Fort, &c. FOUR DAYS' LATER ADVICES. The Indian Empire at Halifax and the City of Baltimore off Cape Race. IMPORTANT FROM INDIA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Indian Empire, Capt. COURTNAY, from Galway on the morning of the 28th ultimo, passed Cape Race at 7 o'clock on the morning of the 7th instant, arrived off Halifax Harbor at 9 o'clock on the evening of the 9th, and entered the harbor at 1 o'clock on the morning of the 10th.

docs.snippet: THE YELLOW FEVER IN NEW-ORLEANS NO BETTER.--The New-Orleans Picayune of the 3d says: "There is ever indication of a very heavy Fall business, and it is as much as the epidemic can do to keep back to some degree the tide of commerce swelling to our...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE YELLOW FEVER IN NEW-ORLEANS NO BETTER.--The New-Orleans Picayune of the 3d says: "There is ever indication of a very heavy Fall business, and it is as much as the epidemic can do to keep back to some degree the tide of commerce swelling to our port. The daily and weekly reports sufficiently tell the tale of the sickness.

headline.main: EUROPE.; Interesting Items and Extracts. ARRIVAL OF THE CANADA'S MAILS.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the European Mails by the Canada, at Boston, we are placed in possession of our usual files and correspondence. To the details already given, we add the following points of interest. Mr. WHITEHOUSE has written a pamplidet in regard to the Atlantic Telegraph, in which he says:

docs.snippet: The Board met on Saturday in the Mayor's Office. After the discharge of some routine business, the following resolution was put by the Mayor and carried: Resolved, That in view of the low temperature of the atmosphere and the probability of its...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Board met on Saturday in the Mayor's Office. After the discharge of some routine business, the following resolution was put by the Mayor and carried: Resolved, That in view of the low temperature of the atmosphere and the probability of its continuance, it is not dangerous to the public health to waive pretty much all Quarantine restrictions in regard to vessels,
